title: The Record of My Heart
description: Daniel Grant desperately wants Aubrey Price, a woman he can't haveâ€”at least not for two long months. He could give up and walk away, but he won't. Following in his grandfather's footsteps, he waits.  And while he waits...he writes. Through a series of journals and letters, The Record of my Heart traces Daniel's romantic contemplations, what he calls "the secret musings of a man tumbling headfirst in love..."
author: Georgina Guthrie
